page.title: 11ANCIENT SETTLEMENTS
page.content: There is an ancient settlement earthworks,in quadrant,B4.Higher Cookworthy (C4) is one of the oldest farming settlements in{DEVON}.Records show six,strip type,farms being evident 1,000 years ago Smallacombe farm was mentioned in the original Domesday Book.Thomas de Karle gave his name to Higher Carley Farm (C2) first noted in 1289 AD.Many of the local farms houses are 200 _ 400years old. Wortham Manor has a ceiling that is 400 years old.Woolidon Farm (A2) dates from the 15th century with additions built in the 18th century. The church dates from Norman times. {LIFTON}itself is a very old settlement situated as it is near the river a crossing and in a natural valley.
